thread.title: Still a great value in London -
thread.title_full: Still a great value in London - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jayawayfromhome
title: Still a great value in London -
text:
This was my third time staying at this hotel, and like the previous two times I had a consistent experience. I booked through hotels.com so got a room with a window, internet, and all the other optional amenities booking direct makes you pay extra for. The hotel is clean and modern and excellent value compared to other nearby hotels.
I would recommend this hotel.
